properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 3:05PM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY
